revised_title: On the Curvature of the Indian Arc and Ocean Attraction
tldr: The author investigates the curvature of the Indian Arc of Meridian and the effect of ocean attraction on the plumb-line. By incorporating ocean attraction corrections into Captain Clarke's calculations, the author improves the resulting ellipse and reduces errors in latitude. The author concludes that the discrepancies between the Indian Arc and the mean ellipse may be due to significant changes in the Earth's surface and level relative to the water.
